titles.title: Designating the month of May 1993 as "United States Armed Forces History Month".

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H1762)
Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 3/31/1993--Introduced. Designates May 1993 as United States Armed Forces History Month.
